metadata.description: Collection of always-current documentation navigation plugins for popular open source projects

plugins.name: hiivmind-corpus-polars
plugins.description: Always-current Polars documentation with intelligent navigation. Use when working with Polars DataFrames, expressions, lazy API, or Rust dataframe operations.

plugins.name: hiivmind-corpus-ibis
plugins.description: Always-current Ibis documentation with intelligent navigation. Use when working with portable dataframe expressions across 20+ SQL backends.

plugins.name: hiivmind-corpus-narwhals
plugins.description: Always-current Narwhals documentation with intelligent navigation. Use when writing dataframe-agnostic code for pandas, Polars, PyArrow, and more.

plugins.name: hiivmind-corpus-substrait
plugins.description: Always-current Substrait documentation with intelligent navigation. Use when working with cross-language query plans and data compute interoperability.
